subject: Physical Fitness
title: Implementation Intentions
description: A fast breakdown of Implementation Intentions for builders.

hook.text: Saying 'I'll exercise more' is a wish. Saying 'Monday at 7 AM, I'll run in the park' is a plan. Plans win.

buildup.text: Implementation intentions use the format: 'When [situation], I will [behavior].' They pre-decide action.

discovery.text: Research shows implementation intentions double the likelihood of following through on exercise goals.

twist.text: They work because they bypass deliberation. When the situation arrives, the decision is already made.

climax.text: Adding 'if-then' plans for obstacles â€” 'If it rains, I'll do a home workout instead' â€” eliminates common excuses.

punchline.text: Decide when, where, and how in advance. Plans beat good intentions.

quiz.question: How much do implementation intentions increase follow-through on exercise?
options: They only work for elite athletes
